name: Build-n-Blocks
description:
A 1-bit puzzle game, built in a fortnight as part of a private game jam, with the theme "BUILD"

Build-n-Blocks is a falling blocks puzzle game, in which you're a contractor building homes on top of an ever-growing apartment tower block

[Overworld controls] ⬆️⬇️⬅️➡️ to move, walk into people to interact, progress text with [space/enter]
[Puzzle controls] ⬆️⬇️⬅️➡️ to move, [P] to pause, [A] and [D] to rotate clockwise and anti-clockwise respectively

(You can delete progress in the settings menu, saving doesn't appear to work in web version)
